summary: The document is a mortgage agreement dated March 2, 1978, between a married couple from New York (the mortgagors) and the Roush-Walker Company based in Atlanta, Georgia (the mortgagee). It secures a debt of $167,429.88 with a property located at 163 East 71st Street, New York, NY, described in detail including its boundaries and dimensions. The document also references the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, suggesting a possible connection or context related to the release of records under this act.
key_findings: The document is a mortgage agreement securing a debt with a property in Manhattan, NY.
The mortgagors are a married couple from New York, and the mortgagee is the Roush-Walker Company from Atlanta, GA.
The property is located at 163 East 71st Street, New York, NY, with detailed boundary descriptions.
The document references the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, indicating a possible historical or legal context.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
